dryad_doi_set: A user linked a Dryad DOI to a project
dryad_doi_unset: A user unselected a Dryad DOI in a project
dryad_file_added: A user added a file to a Dryad DOI in a project
dryad_file_removed: A user removed a file in a Dryad DOI in a project
dryad_file_updated: A user updated a file in a Dryad DOI in a project
dryad_folder_created: A user created a folder in a Dryad in a project
dryad_node_authorized: A user authorized the Dryad addon for a project
dryad_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Dryad addon for a project
dryad_node_deauthorized_no_user: Dryad addon for a project deauthorized
